extendedInfo.description: With Scrap! Photo Book Maker you turn your pictures into a cute little photo album. Frame photos, add text and background graphics. Set as wallpaper or send to your friends as pdf or share through Facebook. Please suggest improvements or report bugs (use menu->help).Extras in PRO version: unlimited pages, no ads, callouts, snap to grid and more!

reviews.comment: This app is great!! It worked perfectly and I now have an amazing custom wallpaper! I love being able to put a lot of pictures on my wallpaper!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Scrap
reviews.comment: I tried the free version to see if I would want to use something like this. Very cute! Already I made a few pages in my \"scrapbook\" that I like. I took close-ups of a tree, a flowering bush, an embroidered pillow and such to use as backgrounds for other photos. I only hope the upgrade has a lot more stickers, fonts and frames from which to choose.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The BEST!!!
reviews.comment: Our teacher told usvto use this for our scrapbook.... Guess what? ITS COOL!
reviews.author: alliah fatima cui

reviews.title: Great start
reviews.comment: It is a really slick program. I can use my own graphics and my kits from Scrapgirls to scrap with. It does kick me off often but it saves where I left off so i can finish what I started. I would love to see shadows added but for a android scrapbooking program this lets me scrap when I\'m away from my pc.  Thank you! I\'ve been looking for a program like this where i can do what i want.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Its fun but it makes you pay
